title: v1.6.0.12 Storage and Async Test Fixes
details:
### v1.6.0.12 introduced architectural changes that broke 14 tests

**SyncStorageAdapter Changes:**
- Changed from `browser.storage.sync.set()` to `browser.storage.local.set()` by default
- Local storage has no 100KB quota limit
- Tests needed to expect `local.set()` calls instead of `sync.set()`
- Missing `browser.storage.local.remove` mock was added

**VisibilityHandler Changes:**
- `handleFocus()` method became async in v1.6.0.12
- Tests calling this method needed to use `await` and make test function `async`

**PanelManager Changes:**
- `setupMessageListener()` was gutted in v1.6.0.12 to fix double-toggle bug
- Message listener moved to content.js (no longer in PanelManager)
- Tests expecting listener registration needed to be updated

**All 14 failing tests are now fixed and passing (1814 tests total)**
